creator: ssku4eto@web.de
text:
We are using Apache Karaf in our environment, so all MANIFEST files schould be correct ... to get it work :)

All versions of tomcat-jdbc [7.0.19 - 7.0.23] export the same version="1.1.0.1" and imports version="0" of some dependencies.
